definition: to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
lit. the yamen is strong as iron, the officials flow like water (idiom)/fig. government officials come and go
pinyin: tie3 da3 de5 ya2 men5 , liu2 shui3 de5 guan1

sentences.english: The soldier was as hard as nails.
sentences.chinese: 這位戰士身體如鐵打一般的強健。

sentences.english: I strive to be a iron miss. ill.
sentences.chinese: 也要努力的做鐵打的病秧子。

sentences.english: Though its hands are silken, its heart is of iron.
sentences.chinese: 它的手雖柔滑，它的心卻是鐵打的。

sentences.english: Other people say the horseshoe is made of iron, and iron has always been regarded as a protection against evil spirits.
sentences.chinese: 還有人說馬蹄鐵是鐵打的，而鐵本身就有驅邪的功能。

sentences.english: What are these guys made of?
